function encodeBytesOnInstall(address royaltyRecipient, uint16 royaltyBps, address transferValidator) pure returns (bytes)
function getTransferValidationFunction() pure returns (bytes4 functionSignature, bool isViewFunction)
function royaltyInfo(uint256 _tokenId, uint256 _salePrice) view returns (address receiver, uint256 royaltyAmount)
event DefaultRoyaltyUpdated(address indexed recipient, uint256 bps)
event TokenRoyaltyUpdated(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed recipient, uint16 bps)
